channel.title: Runserver.bat issues for private client?
channel.description:
when i click runserver.bat in my private client it comes up then disappears straight away how do i fix it?
it has problems finding java cause it says quickly before it dissappears 'java' is not recognised and i didnt get the rest of it how do i fix it?

item.title: Runserver.bat issues for private client?
item.dc:creator: @ownage-2007 ownage-2007
item.description:
@ownage-2007 wrote:

Use:

Mod Taharok’s Ultimate Compiler - Can Compile & Run In The Same Window - Handy

Go To Mod Taharok’s Server Guide In Tut Section For More Help.

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver.bat issues for private client?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

I would suggest you go to ‘~The Ultimate Server Guide~’ in the Tutorial’s Section and use that Compiler and Runserver. They are really good.

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver.bat issues for private client?
item.dc:creator: @sp00nkitty sp00nkitty
item.description:
@sp00nkitty wrote:

yes i do have jdk 6

and im using this compiler/runner:

[code]TITLE Only The Best Client Compiler\runner
@ECHO OFF
CD files

:info
CLS
ECHO RageClient
ECHO By RAGE
ECHO --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ECHO Welcome To The RageClient
ECHO --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ECHO Type 1 To play
ECHO Type 2 To compile the client
ECHO Type 3 To close this window
SET option=
ECHO.
SET /p option=Choos an option.
if %option%==1 goto runclient
if %option%==2 goto compile
if %option%==4 goto update
if %option%==3 exit

:update
@echo off
Title RageClient compiler Feature/Update Lijst
ECHO Client Side 100 Procent In Nederlands
ECHO Server Side 100 Procent In Nederlands (Hoop Ik)
ECHO More Updates Coming Soon!
PAUSE
CLS
GOTO info

:runclient
CLS
@echo off
Title RageClient client Starter
JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI
PAUSE
CLS
GOTO info

:compile
CLS
@echo off
Title RageClient client Compiler
echo Compiling…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac” *.java -nowarn *.java
echo Complete!
PAUSE
CLS
GOTO info
PAUSE
GOTO info[/code]

Read full topic
